properties.title: Thermal Baths Ovronnaz
properties.abstract: The Ovronnaz Thermal Baths provide the best the mountains have to offer. Indulge in our three indoor and outdoor swimming pools set against a backdrop of spectacular alpine scenery or pamper yourself with our extensive selection of spa treatments.
properties.description:
Regenerative, relaxing and healing, the Ovronnaz Thermal Baths provide the best the mountains have to offer. The warm water and the precious minerals they contain promote a state of relaxation and well-being. The baths consist of three pools with a total of more than 600m2 water with easy movement between the different pools.

Indoors, you will find a warm atmosphere covered by a solid timber frame along with a jacuzzi heated to 36°C, three rest areas and a children’s pool.

Outdoors, you can soak up the sun in our two outdoor pools, complete with hydromassage beds, benches and jets, swan-neck massage jets and three whirlpools. During the week between 8.30 a.m. and 12 a.m., the various animations are deactivated, allowing visitors to enjoy the quiet of the mountains at its best in outdoor pool no. 2.
properties.highlights:
Kiddie pool, play area, quiet area

Sauna, showers, WC facilities
